dt: {bc}an accumulation of loose stones or rocky debris lying on a slope or at the base of a hill or cliff {bc}{sx|talus||}

et: Scots & northern English dialect, of Scandinavian origin; akin to Old Norse {it}skritha{/it} landslide, from {it}skrītha{/it} to creep; akin to Old High German {it}scrītan{/it} to go, Lithuanian {it}skriesti{/it} to turn
shortdef: an accumulation of loose stones or rocky debris lying on a slope or at the base of a hill or cliff : talus
